1.title: The Mob Before Las Vegas

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

1.plot: An exploration of the Mob's beginnings and influence in the city of New York.

2.title: Las Vegas Before the Mob

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

2.plot: Before the Mob made their mark in Las Vegas, the town was a barren one.

3.title: The Mob Comes to Las Vegas

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

3.plot: The Mob's influence started growing during the 1920s and 1930s.

4.title: Las Vegas' Golden Age

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

4.plot: Las Vegas hit the jackpot post-WWII through 1960.

5.title: On Top of the World

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

5.plot: To lure in additional visitors, Vegas became the destination for top performers, innovative tourism tactics and big payouts.

6.title: Las Vegas Becomes a Modern City

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

6.plot: Spectacle invades the city that never sleeps and a technological revolution takes place.

7.title: Vegas Reinvents Itself

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

7.plot: As the old Mob dwindles, a whole new Mob starts to take over.

8.title: The End of Mob Rule in Las Vegas

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

8.plot: Through regulation and investigation, the Mob was forced out of Vegas to keep the city "clean"

9.title: Corporate Vegas

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

9.plot: The 1990s brought about changes to Vegas where corporations and large businesses transformed Vegas to the city we know today.

10.title: Las Vegas - America's Third City

episode of.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (TV Series 2009)

10.plot: In the 21st Century, Vegas must uphold its reputation as one of America's most famous cities.

imdb.title: Vegas: The City the Mob Made
akas: Vegas: The City the Mob Made (United States)
plot: Las Vegas - There's no city like it on earth. An adult playground in the sun, the city is home to some of the world's most famous casinos and attractions.
